About

Steps I took to create this website.

  • 1 AM on 3/20/2024

    The Humble Beginning

    Created a github repository!

  • 1:05 AM on 3/20/2024

    Phase One: The cloning!

    Installed NPM and cloned a bootstrap template!

  • 1:10 AM on 3/20/2024

    Phase Two: Customization

    Started changing the html to personalize the website!

  • 4 AM on 3/20/2024

    Phase Three: Finishing touches!

    Hosting the website on AWS Amplify!

  • The Website
    Is
    COMPLETE!

Balatro

A poker roguelike.

Balatro is a deckbuilder where you play poker hands to overcome a set point total which increases with each round. The game features a few mechanics: Joker cards, Planet cards, Coupons, and Tarot cards to help surpass the increasing difficulty. It is very easy to pick up and extremely fun to play. Check it out!

Backpack Battles

A PvP inventory management auto battler!

A PvP game which focuses on inventory management.

Buy and craft various items, arrange them in your backpack, and watch as your character battles for you!

Path of Exile

An online Action RPG

Path of Exile is a popular online action RPG. The sheer amount of content in this 11 year old game is staggering and scares some people away from playing it. But learning and exploring the depths of this game is extrmely fun.
